page.title: 01BARNBY DUN WITH KIRK SANDALL
page.content: The area consists largely of{commuter {housing}in the villages of{Kirk {Sandall and Barnby Dun}surrounded by {high quality agricultural land}mainly given over to crops,wheat,barley sugar beet,potatoes and oats. The most significant industrial site is that of {Thorpe Marsh Power Station},with its 6 cooling towers and the many overhead electricity transmission lines.The area has changed in the last 25 years from semi-rural to a{major {dormitory area}for Doncaster.There is a high level of owner occupation.The area is crossed by the{River Dun {Navigation}and the{River Don}.The main{Doncaster/Hull /Cleethorpes {railway line}passes through the area but there are no facilities for either passengers or freight.
